name: delete_line_in_region
description: DL inside a scroll region removes cursor line and pulls content up within the region only
comment: Fill 5 rows with A-E. Set scroll region rows 2-4 (CSI 2;4 r, top=1 bottom=4). CUP(2,1) to (1,0). DL(1) deletes row 1, pulls C->1, D->2, blank at row 3. Row 4 (E) unchanged.
